summary: About $TOE - $TOE (AKA Triangle Joe) is a crypto meme coin starring the triangular rendition of Joe! Born from the same concept of solidarity, camaraderie, and support, but with a quirky geometric twist. As a triangle, $TOE adds a playful edge to the concept, symbolizing unity and strength from its three sides. As an embodiment of hope and positivity, $TOE aims to disrupt the meme coin market with its unique shape and underlying message of unity. Much like its circular counterpart, $TOE symbolizes the unsung heroes and serves as a beacon of encouragement amidst the volatility of the crypto market. So, join the $TOE movement, embrace the angles and spread the $TOE love, it's a triangle of joy in an emoji-filled universe!
